patthana11.7:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
patthana11.7:1.1_2: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana11.7:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana11.7:3.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
patthana11.7:3.1_2: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana11.7:4.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana11.7:5.1_2: ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana11.7:6.1_2: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana11.7:7.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Sabbattha sattarasa. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana11.7:8.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
patthana11.7:8.1_2: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana11.7:9.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
patthana11.7:10.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
patthana11.7:11.1_0: Nakusalaṁ namahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naappamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
patthana11.7:11.1_2: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana11.7:12.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naparittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ namahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana11.7:13.1_1: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
